import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Button, Modal, Icon, TextArea } from 'semantic-ui-react' import CreateEditTasks from '../components/CreateEditTasks' const EditTask = (props) => { return ( // } header='Edit/Delete Task' content={props.selectedTask} actions={['Snooze', { key: 'done', content: 'Done', positive: true }]} >
setTask(e.target.value)} value={props.selectedTask.title} /> {/* */}

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { selectedTask: state.selectedTask } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(EditTask)
